name: Country Inn & Suites By Carlson, Rock Falls

reviews.text: We stayed here with a free night we had earned and they let us upgrade the room to a suite for an extra $14! Breakfast was decent, and we were pleasantly surprised to find the pool was well heated for our little girl.
reviews.title: Nice & clean, friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is wonderful!!! Great accommodating staff (front desk and breakfast area) make your stay very nice. The room was large, bright, clean and everything was in working order. Made this week long stay very comfortable and would stay again if in the Rock Falls / Sterling area again. Our room was quiet and the bed was absolutely the best. Thank you again!
reviews.title: Best Place to stay in the Rock Falls/Sterling area.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our stay started off very well when the hotel called to ask if we would like to be bumped up to a king room instead of a room with two queen beds. We were in town for a wedding, and they also allowed us to check in a little after noon rather than the 3:00 check-in time. The room was very clean, and the bed was very comfortable. Our room was very quiet, and you can tell the hotel has a commitment to giving guests a quiet stay, because the staff broke up the wedding after-party going on in one of our friends' room very quickly (as they should have). Our only complaint was that the fire alarm woke us up at 8:00 a.m. Sunday morning, but I would prefer a false alarm to NOT hearing an alarm in a real fire!
reviews.title: Very nice stay

reviews.text: A bit more expensive than other motels in Rock Falls. It was clean, staff was friendly, and was a good place for a "home base" while back visiting family and friends. Coffee available around the clock; had family over on Sunday to use the pool. Overall a very good experience.
reviews.title: Nice Motel--Clean & Comfortable

reviews.text: Hotel was clean, newer comfortable beds, good breakfast, attentive staff, only complaint was air conditioner was not working, but staff quickly resolved by giving us a new room. A little expensive for the area, but probably due to lack of competition in area.
reviews.title: Labor Day weekend

aka: Country Inn & Suites By Carlson, Rock Falls Hotel Rock Falls
